root.Summary: 1: Annis DS, Ma H, Balas DM, Kumfer KT, Sandbo N, Potts GK, Coon JJ, Mosher DF.Absence of Vitamin K-Dependent γ-Carboxylation in Human Periostin Extracted from Fibrotic Lung or Secreted from a Cell Line Engineered to Optimizeγ-Carboxylation. PLoS One. 2015 Aug 14;10(8):e0135374. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0135374. eCollection 2015. PubMed PMID: 26273833; PubMedCentral PMCID: PMC4537219.
